newsfeed:
Release, we made it!

If you have any suggestions be sure to let me know!
With the release of v1.0.0 the location where it grabs *this* info will be moved - while I plan to support the beta version for awhile, it will stop getting update reminders after some time.
Thanks for using my app!
description:
Release v1.0.0

Added A1a pack series.
In all honestly I can't remember the changelog for this but it was mostly bug fixing and code cleanup. Enjoy!

beta v0.1.2

code updates to fix super long loading times
fixed hide button
added changelog window
added the option to turn off autosaving, helpful to reduce lagg for new profiles
NOTE: currently working on getting Apex A to a state i like, once i'm happy with it, promo A will be updated to the same.
changelog:
beta v0.1.1

The saving code has been updated to try prevent future corruption,
 please report to Ad if your save data was lost.

Bigger pictures now in Apex A1
New layout in Apex A1
New stat tracking in Apex A1
Rarity has now been added in Apex A1
